description: This is a Kotlin source file defining the CartFragment class, which is an Android Fragment responsible for displaying and managing the shopping cart UI in a food delivery app. It initializes UI components, observes cart data, and updates the UI accordingly.

classes.name: CartFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that displays the shopping cart, handles user interactions, and updates the UI components based on cart data.
